title: Missing Person - College Student
description: 21-year-old female student missing for 72 hours. Last seen leaving campus library. Phone last pinged near industrial area.

persons.name: Emma Richardson
persons.description: Female, 21 years old, 5'5, 120 lbs, brown hair, blue eyes. Last seen wearing gray hoodie and jeans.

persons.name: Michael Torres
persons.statement: I'm her boyfriend. We texted at 9 PM. She said she was leaving the library. Never came home.

persons.name: Kayla Johnson
persons.statement: I saw Emma in the library. She seemed stressed about exams. Left around 9 PM alone.

persons.name: Professor David Chen
persons.description: Emma's advisor. Students report he had 'unusual interest' in Emma.

evidence.description: Emma's class schedule and recent communications
Recent photos of Emma for distribution
